topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7b5736368722f937d0200#post_53d7b5736368722f937d0200
Byakuren, this character, is a buddhist monk and that her back story summarized in one paragraph is that "Youkai" and humans were massive dicks to each other and constantly gloating about how much they were dicks to each other.  Byakuren realizes that "Youkai" aren't evil and that both sides just like being dicks to each other; she tries to help everyone regardless and try to find peaceful solutions to conflicts and as a result of her not being a murderous bitch she gets thrown into the demon realm cause can't have a saint speaking peace during a war and muddying the "truth" that "all <x population> are fundamentally evil" can we?  The game is basically her friends breaking her out of jail during modern times.

topics.body:
Hey I'm just curious, but giving ponies guns like modern firearms is a terrible idea right? Because they'll probably shoot themselves or everyone else, or maybe not.

Well what about giving them pre-modern firearms?
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fusil_Gras_mle_1874

I mean how much harm can come from giving them bolt action single shot guns, which happen to be 100 years old?
That or cannons, like a 37mm howitzer?

"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7bf546368726e82b90000#post_53d7bf546368726e82b90000
Depends; a mlp pony would have to have a specialized gun because guns are specifically designed for humans and if they were to fire a gun chances are the barrel would smack them in the face.

"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7c215636872792d500100#post_53d7c215636872792d500100

I think harness would be preferable in comparison to using tails, I mean if they had it cut short or something it might be a little problematic.
Okay so yeah a harness with a gravity loading magazine from top to bottom, with mouth controls for fire.

Probably a pain in the ass to make, but useable, and a little more realistic I guess.

topics.body:
Well back to arming the living hell out of ponies, or making them more dangerous than having the ability to induce heart attacks and give us all diabetes.

42mm mountain guns made in the US, breach loaded and pretty simple, should I give them steam powered tanks to mount these things on or is that just overkill? I mean horse power is okay, since they're all small horses, but I don't know about them pulling 300+ kg objects over long distances. 

Unless its Big Mac, but I planned on mounting a 37mm Bofors onto him and letting him kick the stuffing out of dragons.

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7c6736368720e37440200#post_53d7c6736368720e37440200

Yeah that might work, though I think using this would work better for mobile light artillery. 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vickers-Crayford_rocket_gun

One reason I think about that is because its probably lighter than 300+ kg guns, well even if you strip it down for the carriage and have some strong stallion tow the thing across a battlefield, you can't expect them to heft dozens of ammo on top of that, the gun weighs a lot with carriage, and having 2 stallions pull with someone on the chariot reloading and firing would be extremely exhausting.

Also the bigger the carriage/chariot the bigger the target. So a more compact lightweight gun is needed. That or a tank, but once again, I'm holding off on that for the moment.


"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7c5936368725465690100#post_53d7c5936368725465690100

Uh dude, I'm talking about Earth ponies, not unicorns, Pegasi can use the weather, but that won't last forever, and they are vulnerable to AA guns I'm pretty sure they can't survive a wall of shrapnel.

As for unicorns, I'm pretty sure their power is limited to their level of skill and such, or bloodline wise. 

Also a war fought between mortals is more important, especially when immortals have no place in it. Celestia and Luna might not agree, but it is being fought out by everyone else besides them for various reasons.

topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7c33c6368722e3a0a0100#post_53d7c33c6368722e3a0a0100
Nah; a exosuit would be the way to go:
!http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2012/211/3/0/exosuit_by_vombavr-d595bmo.jpg!
The artist is vombavr on deviantart.

The reason why it would be easier is that a exosuit would just need to help the pony balance on hind legs, a support for their hips and a grip on the gun.  A gun that attaches to the back would be more like the smart gun from Aliens:
!http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131006172605/avp/images/thumb/a/a2/M56-smart-gun-aliens.jpg/500px-M56-smart-gun-aliens.jpg!
